videos.headline: Pickett connects with Addison in the end zone

videos.headline: Pitt comes up big with a 39-yard TD on fourth down
videos.description: Taysir Mack is wide open as Kenny Pickett throws a go-ahead touchdown pass for Pittsburgh before halftime.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Pitt comes up big with a 39-yard TD on fourth down) 2021/10/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: Pitt's defense returns interception 50 yards to the house
videos.description: SirVocea Dennis intercepts D.J. Uiagalelei's pitch and takes it 50 yards for a touchdown.
